embed.description: Update, August 25: Riot have revealed the likelihood of acquiring various skins using its Hextech crafting loot system. Riot Games have revealed that the chance of getting a rare Hextech crafting skin is one in 2,000, or 0.05%.

replies.body: If you're reading this- don't buy the lootboxes. It literally just waters down all of your money to nothing. Blue essence is a joke currency, hence the numbers are so high, you forget what it's actually worth (nothing.) I've spent $1500 on skins and lootboxes, about $400 on lootboxes. I got really nothing from the lootboxes but tonnes of blue essence from getting rid of all the champs.. Now i have 150k blue essence with nothing to spend it on because riot still want rp for their skins. It's a joke
It would be cheaper to buy all the skins you can and then reroll for legacy etc
I mean, a lot of the skins don't give you enough Orange Essence now to be worth anything but random rolling with 3 of them, because they don't even give a third of their cost.
